description: This Java class 'RecipeMapper' provides utility methods for converting between Recipe entity objects and DTO representations in a recipe management backend. It includes methods to create or update 'Recipe' entities from DTOs and to generate DTO responses from entities.

classes.name: RecipeMapper
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to convert between Recipe DTOs and Recipe entities.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts a RecipeRequest DTO into a Recipe entity, associating it with a given Category and populating ingredients.

methods.name: updateEntity
methods.description: Updates an existing Recipe entity with data from a RecipeRequest DTO, including replacing its ingredients.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Recipe entity into a RecipeResponse DTO, including nested ingredient details.
